title: The Magician VR - Trailer
description: Trailer of the yet unreleased videogame 'The Magician VR: The Cursed Wand', under development of Master Crowd Games

title: TROM
description:
Full soundtrack of the videogame 'TROM', developed by Master Crowd Games released on 2023.
The soundtrack is inspired by the retro videogames of the 80s and 90s, with a modern twist.
You can find the game on the Nintendo eShop

title: Frutageddon
description:
Full soundtrack of the videogame 'Frutageddon', developed by Master Crowd Games expected to be released on 2025.
The soundtrack is recorded with real wind instruments such as Saxophones and Trumpets and each track is inspired in a different contintent of the world.
